title: Hospital Administrative Rules Index
description: Master index of all hospital-perspective administrative rules for the revenue cycle. These rules are designed to optimize legitimate revenue, prevent denials, ensure compliance, and maximize accounts receivable recovery.
descriptionPt: Indice mestre de todas as regras administrativas na perspectiva hospitalar para o ciclo de receita. Estas regras sao projetadas para otimizar receita legitima, prevenir glosas, garantir conformidade e maximizar recuperacao de contas a receber.

AUTH.name: Authorization Management
AUTH.description: Pre-authorization, appeals, timing, urgency, coding, and documentation validation rules

BILL.name: Billing Optimization
BILL.description: Bundle validation, upcoding prevention, modifier validation, quantity checks, and time-based billing rules

COMP.name: Compliance Management
COMP.description: ANS regulations, TISS standards, audit trails, deadline management, accreditation, LGPD, and international compliance rules

DENY.name: Denial Prevention and Prediction
DENY.description: Rules to predict and prevent claim denials, including payer-specific patterns, timing issues, medical necessity, and documentation gaps

RECV.name: Accounts Receivable Management
RECV.description: Aging analysis, denial recovery, provisions management, rework routing, negotiation, and write-off rules

impactAnalysis.potentialDenialPrevention: Estimated 15-25% reduction in denials through pre-submission validation
impactAnalysis.revenueOptimization: Estimated 5-10% increase in legitimate captured revenue
impactAnalysis.complianceRisk: Reduced regulatory risk through automated compliance checking
impactAnalysis.operationalEfficiency: Reduced rework through upstream denial prevention
